section.name: Overview
section.p: The frontend is composed of services and components that implement those services. The frontend components are depicted in the component UML diagram below with their service interfaces and their dependency relationships:

section.name: Components
section.p: Each component has a service interface which is defined within an service provider interface (SPI) project which also includes supporting classes and interfaces like monitors, and configuration beans. Each component also has a POJO implementation project and a one or more container specific projects wrapping the POJO implementation. The source organization of a component is discussed in greater detail here.
